author: Albert Nigmatzianov <albertnigma@gmail.com>
message:
Make Feedback print to output via log instead of fmt

log.Output is faster than fmt.Print:
name               time/op
FprintString-4     153ns ± 3%
LogOutputString-4  139ns ± 3%

name               alloc/op
FprintString-4     16.0B ± 0%
LogOutputString-4  0.00B

name               allocs/op
FprintString-4      1.00 ± 0%
LogOutputString-4   0.00

Benchmark code:
package main

import (
	"bytes"
	"fmt"
	"log"
	"testing"
)

func BenchmarkFprintString(b *testing.B) {
	var buf bytes.Buffer
	b.ResetTimer()
	for i := 0; i < b.N; i++ {
		buf.Reset()
		fmt.Fprint(&buf, "test")
	}
}

func BenchmarkLogString(b *testing.B) {
	var buf bytes.Buffer
	log := log.New(&buf, "", 0)
	b.ResetTimer()
	for i := 0; i < b.N; i++ {
		buf.Reset()
		log.Output(2, "test")
	}
}
